oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ALE scalar-flat K\"ahler metrics on non-compact weighted projective spaces
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Apostolov, Vestislav
Rollin, Yann
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Differential Geometry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We construct new explicit toric scalar-flat K{\"a}hler ALE metrics on weighted projective spaces of non-compact type, which we use to obtain smooth extremal K{\"a}hler metrics on appropriate resolutions of orbifolds. In particular, we obtain new extremal metrics certain resolutions of weighted projective spaces of compact type.
